description: This file defines a React functional component 'ChatInput' that provides a user interface for message input, connector selection via prefixes, live search for references, and message sending functionality within a chat application. It manages state for message content, selected connector, references, and prefix detection, and interacts with external components 'LiveSearch' and hooks 'useTenant'.

methods.name: ChatInput
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders the chat input interface, manages state, and handles user interactions such as prefix detection, reference tagging, and message submission.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Exports the 'ChatInput' component as the default export of the module.
